attributes.action: Allow students in 3 year GCSE to receive Teacher Assessed Grades in 2022.
attributes.additional_details: Following the disruption due to COVID-19 they have faced in the past 2 academic years, with lockdown's and isolation's. Following the success of the 2021 TAG's, the data shows it is the right thing for teachers to assess students rather than an an exam. Many students from a disadvantage background, deprived area or has educational needs, will benefit more from TAG's than exams. Exams provide much more additional stress to students and effect there mental health while TAG's won't.
attributes.background: Allow students who take a 3 year GCSE to receive Teacher Assessed Grades in 2022.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578115
